LanguageData.AccuracyTouch.label: Accuracy (close)
LanguageData.AccuracyTouch.description: The weapon's accuracy at a distance of 3 cells or less. An actual shot's chance to hit will also be affected by other factors.
LanguageData.AccuracyShort.label: Точність (мала відстань)
LanguageData.AccuracyShort.description: The weapon's accuracy at a distance of 12 cells. An actual shot's chance to hit will also be affected by other factors.
LanguageData.AccuracyMedium.label: Точність (середня відстань)
LanguageData.AccuracyMedium.description: The weapon's accuracy at a distance of 25 cells. An actual shot's chance to hit will also be affected by other factors.
LanguageData.AccuracyLong.label: Точність (здалека)
LanguageData.AccuracyLong.description: The weapon's accuracy at a distance of 40 cells or more. An actual shot's chance to hit will also be affected by other factors.
LanguageData.RangedWeapon_Cooldown.label: час між пострілами
LanguageData.RangedWeapon_Cooldown.description: Показує, наскільки довго йде підготовка до наступного вистрілу.
LanguageData.RangedWeapon_DamageMultiplier.label: damage multiplier
LanguageData.RangedWeapon_DamageMultiplier.descriptio: A damage multiplier applied to projectiles fired from this weapon.
